thread.title: Selling Proton to foreigners will hurt M'sia, warns Mahathir
thread.title_full: Selling Proton to foreigners will hurt M'sia, warns Mahathir

title: Selling Proton to foreigners will hurt M'sia, warns Mahathir
text:
More 
Selling of the controlling stake in national carmaker Proton to foreigners will not be beneficial for the country, warned former premier Dr Mahathir Mohamad. 
"My fear is that if we do not own Proton anymore the Malaysian automotive industry will suffer a great loss. 
"The vendors and suppliers of components will close shop. Lots of workers will lose their jobs. And Malaysiaâ€™s engineering capacity will be reduced," wrote Mahathir on his blog today.
